name: Unfathomable Mankanshoku Family
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3500 power until end of turn.

name: "Life Fiber Synchronize" Senketsu
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Clothes》 or 《Family》 characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card face down underneath this card as a marker.
【ACT】 [Put a marker from underneath this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Scissor Blade Decapitation Mode, Ryuko
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +4000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you can choose 1 "Only Clothing Ryuko Has, Senketsu" or ""Life Fiber Synchronize" Senketsu" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Battle of Fate" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and put it into your hand.
flavor_text: Let's do it! Scissor Blade: Decapitation Mode!

name: "Rampage" Ryuko
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Encounter with Senketsu, Ryuko", you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, you may put that card into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.

name: "Changing Into Senketsu" Ryuko
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When "The time comes when a girl outgrows her sailor uniform" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: "Kamui Junketsu" Satsuki
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Clothes》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: For the Survival of the Human Race, Satsuki
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Junketsu" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 marker underneath this card into your waiting room] When your other "Conclusion After Wearing! Ryuko" is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. if you do, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, put that card underneath that character face down as a marker.
flavor_text:
It's in your hands now.
For the survival of the human race--

name: Clear Resolution, Satsuki
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if "Battle of Fate" is in your waiting room, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: For Her Desires, Nui
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Clothes》 characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.

【AUTO】 [(4) Put 3 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card underneath your character in battle face down as a marker] When your other character in battle with marker and "Ragyo(羅暁)" in its card name becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 that character.

name: Winter Look, Ryuko
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - KILL La KILL
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 2 or higher characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
